job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly relates to the process of gathering and organizing data, which is a core component of data engineering.
This phrase refers to the design and oversight of data systems, a key responsibility within data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Setting up the CI/CD pipeline in a secure way
job_tasks.justification: Setting up CI/CD pipelines is a fundamental MLOps task, ensuring automated deployment and integration.
Developing APIs is a standard software development practice for enabling system integrations.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying solid software engineering way of working
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on established software development methodologies and practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Setup monitoring for generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: Setting up monitoring for AI models, especially generative AI, falls under MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: utilizing generative AI for customer care
job_tasks.justification: The mention of utilizing generative AI indicates involvement with AI models, fitting the broader scope of Modeling.
Building a chatbot, especially one involving AI, is a form of model application and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Improving solutions to summarize and label why customers contact us
job_tasks.justification: Summarizing and labeling customer contact reasons implies working with text data and potentially NLP models, fitting under Modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Making updates to our website (FAQ) and chatbot to use more interactive capabilities of GenAI
job_tasks.justification: Enhancing website and chatbot capabilities with GenAI directly involves applying and potentially fine-tuning generative AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: scaling to responds to many agents and customers
job_tasks.justification: Scaling solutions to handle a large user base is an operational concern, related to MLOps for production systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Eagerness for growth and embracing challenges.
You are responsible for your own development. That is why you decide how, what and when you learn.
We value 'Culture Add' over 'Culture Fit'. We are not recruiting clones. We're interested in what unique qualities you bring to our team, data universe and culture.
The excitement lies in tackling setting up solid monitoring of generative AI solutions

classification.rationale: The role explicitly focuses on utilizing and improving generative AI capabilities for customer care, including building chatbots and enhancing existing systems. While there are data engineering and software development tasks, the core emphasis and 'fun' of the role are on applying and scaling GenAI solutions.
